excellence.title: Pure excellence
excellence.description: A 500m² exceptional villa nestled between sky and sea, offering an unparalleled luxury experience on the French Riviera.

service.title: Tailored service
service.description: Every stay at Villa Azur is a unique experience, with personalized service to meet your most demanding desires.

intro.title: Our Villa
intro.subtitle: Discover where Mediterranean luxury meets the art of living.

overview.title: A haven on the French Riviera
overview.description: Perched on the heights of Roquebrune Cap Martin, Villa Azur offers breathtaking views of the Mediterranean and the Italian coast. This exceptional 500m² property has been designed to offer an unparalleled luxury experience.

kitchen.title: Our Kitchen
kitchen.subtitle: A fully equipped kitchen for optimal comfort

cabinets.title: Upper and Lower Cabinets
cabinets.description: Upper cabinets with invisible fixings and smoked glass in the center, raised lower cabinets with two shelves and 15% extra space.

countertop.title: Countertop and Backsplash
countertop.description: Black quartz countertop with matte anti-fingerprint finish, tempered glass backsplash for easy maintenance.

sink.title: Sink and Faucet
sink.description: Undermount brushed stainless steel sink with pull-out faucet with variable jet for greater flexibility.

dishwasher.title: Smart Dishwasher
dishwasher.description: Built-in dishwasher with eco program and automatic load detection for optimized consumption.

refrigerator.title: Combined Refrigerators
refrigerator.description: Combined refrigerator-freezer with No-Frost compartments and special freshness zone for delicate foods.

oven.title: Oven and Microwave
oven.description: Multifunction oven with steam function and combined microwave for quick and healthy cooking.

cooktop.title: Cooktop
cooktop.description: Induction cooktop with 5 cooking zones and modular bridge to adapt to all types of cookware.

island.title: Central Island
island.description: Central island with integrated storage and concealed electrical outlets for greater practicality in daily use.

island.title: Central Island
island.description: Marble central island with integrated storage space and designer stools.

appliances.title: High-end Appliances
appliances.description: Gaggenau equipment with built-in refrigerator, steam oven, and induction cooktop.

dining.title: Dining Area
dining.description: Solid oak table that can accommodate up to 8 people.

spaces.title: Discover our spaces
spaces.subtitle: Each space in Villa Azur has been designed to offer comfort, elegance, and unforgettable moments.

master.title: Master Suite
master.description: A spacious master suite with panoramic sea view, marble bathroom, and dressing room.

living.title: Main Living Room
living.description: An elegant living room with bay windows offering breathtaking views of the Mediterranean.

terrace.title: Terrace & Pool
terrace.description: A spacious terrace with infinity pool and relaxation area facing the sea.

kitchen.title: Gourmet Kitchen
kitchen.description: A fully equipped kitchen with central island and high-end appliances.

discover.title: Discover
discover.subtitle: Explore the wonders of the French Riviera from Villa Azur.

monaco.title: Monaco
monaco.description: Discover the Principality of Monaco, its legendary casinos, the Prince's Palace, and the Formula 1 Grand Prix.

nice.title: Nice
nice.description: Stroll along the Promenade des Anglais, visit Old Nice and enjoy local gastronomy.

eze.title: Èze Village
eze.description: Medieval village perched offering breathtaking views of the Mediterranean and home to the famous Exotic Garden.

saint_paul.title: Saint-Paul-de-Vence
saint_paul.description: Artists' village with its art galleries, ramparts, and Maeght Foundation.

menton.title: Menton
menton.description: The pearl of France, known for its gardens, lemon festival, and beaches.

antibes.title: Antibes
antibes.description: Discover Port Vauban, Fort Carré, and the Picasso Museum in this historic city.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: A multitude of activities to make your stay unforgettable.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover Villa Azur through our photo gallery.

exterior.title: Villa exterior
exterior.alt: Villa exterior with pool and sea view

living.title: Main Living Room
living.alt: Luxury living room with panoramic windows

info.title: Information
info.subtitle: Everything you need to know to prepare your stay at Villa Azur.

location.title: Location
location.description: Ideally located in Roquebrune Cap Martin, minutes away from Monaco and the most beautiful beaches of the French Riviera.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: The villa is available for rent all year round, with a minimum stay of one week.

amenities.title: Amenities
amenities.description: High-end amenities and personalized services for an exceptional stay.

security.title: Security
security.description: Fully secured property with alarm system, video surveillance, and security service on request.

location.title: Location & Access
location.description: Villa Azur is located in Roquebrune Cap Martin, offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean while being close to the most beautiful sites of the French Riviera.

rules.title: House Rules
rules.subtitle: To ensure everyone's comfort, please respect these rules during your stay.
list: No parties or events without prior authorization
Respect the neighborhood and no noise after 10:00 PM

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact us for any inquiries about the villa or to book your stay.

name.label: Name
name.error: Name must contain at least 2 characters

email.label: Email
email.error: Please enter a valid email address

phone.label: Phone
phone.error: Please enter a valid phone number

message.label: Message
message.error: Message must contain at least 10 characters

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: Thank you for your message. Our team will contact you shortly.
